short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sets the YouTube audio track to the original language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Original Audio Track ensures you always hear YouTube videos in their original audio track, regardless of your current location or regional settings. This extension automatically detects and switches any YouTube video to its original language track, bypassing default regional audio settings that might alter your viewing experience.

Key Features:

Automatic Detection: Instantly identifies and switches to the original audio track of YouTube videos.
Seamless Experience: Runs quietly in the background with no need for manual adjustments.
Universal Compatibility: Works with all YouTube videos that have multiple audio tracks available.
Easy to Use:
Just install the extension, and it starts working immediatelyâ€”no setup required. Enjoy YouTube videos in the way content creators intended, in the original audio format.

Privacy and Security:
The extension does not track your browsing activity or access any data other than the necessary information to change audio settings on YouTube.

Ideal for expatriates, travelers, or anyone who prefers to experience videos in their original language, YouTube Original Audio Track is the perfect tool to enhance your YouTube watching experience.
